doc.title: Ah Seng Durians: D162 Tawa
doc.text: I/PRP got/VBD an/DT excited/JJ SMS/NN from/IN my/PRP$ durian/NN guru/NN that/IN Ah/NN Seng/NNP has/VBZ been/VBN stocking/IN some/DT very/RB good/JJ Tawa/IN this/DT season/NN ./. I/PRP had/VBD only/RB a/DT very/RB brief/JJ encounter/NN with/IN this/DT durian/JJ last/JJ time/NN ,/, so/RB I/PRP had/VBD to/TO make/VB a/DT special/JJ trip/NN to/TO Ah/NN Seng/NNP to/TO find/VB out/IN what/WP the/DT fuss/NN was/VBD all/RB about/IN ./. According/VBG to/TO Ah/NN Seng/NNP ,/, he/PRP only/RB gets/VBZ a/DT bumper/JJ crop/NN of/IN Tawa/NN every/DT 2/CD to/TO 3/CD years/NNS ,/, so/RB the/DT supply/NN of/IN this/DT particular/JJ cultivar/NN is/VBZ quite/RB unpredictable/JJ ./. That/DT is/VBZ one/CD of/IN the/DT reasons/NN why/WRB I/PRP rushed/VB down/VB to/TO Ghim/NNP Moh/NNP market/NNP ASAP/NNP ./. The/DT durian/NN comes/VBZ from/IN Tangkak/NN and/CC was/VBD originally/RB registered/JJ as/IN D162/NN in/IN Selangor/NN ./. But/CC I/PRP am/VBP told/JJ that/IN it/PRP is/VBZ called/VBD Tawa/NN because/IN it/PRP originally/RB came/VBD from/IN the/DT region/NN of/IN Tawau/NN in/IN Sabah/NN ./. The/DT Tawa/NN is/VBZ usually/RB a/DT medium/NN sized/VBD fruit/NN with/IN large/JJ thorns/NN and/CC oblong/NN in/IN shape/NN ./. The/DT thorns/NN and/CC color/NN of/IN the/DT fruit/NN look/VB quite/RB similar/JJ to/TO the/DT Mao/JJ Shan/NN Wang/NN but/CC it/PRP is/VBZ more/RB slender/JJ and/CC there/RB is/VBZ a/DT characteristic/JJ depression/NN at/IN the/DT bottom/NN of/IN the/DT fruit/NN ./. The/DT flesh/NN of/IN the/DT Tawa/NN is/VBZ milky/JJ yellow/NN and/CC the/DT texture/NN is/VBZ light/JJ but/CC creamy/JJ with/IN little/JJ fiber/NN ./. When/WRB it/PRP is/VBZ very/RB ripe/JJ ,/, the/DT flesh/NN gets/VBZ really/RB wet/JJ and/CC that/WDT is/VBZ when/WRB it/PRP gets/VBZ bitter/JJ ./. The/DT bitterness/JJ is/VBZ not/RB like/IN the/DT XO/NN where/WRB you/PRP can/MD really/RB get/VB that/IN alcoholic/NN buzz/NN ./. It/PRP is/VBZ ,/, however/NN ,/, a/DT very/RB good/JJ durian/NN if/IN you/PRP like/VB bitter/JJ durians/NN ./. The/DT husk/NN is/VBZ thin/JJ and/CC you/PRP do/VB get/VB quite/RB a/DT lot/NN of/IN flesh/NN per/NN fruit/NN ./. So/RB ,/, you/PRP can/MD easily/RB fill/VB a/DT square/JJ foam/NN box/NN with/IN two/CD Tawa/NN durians/NN which/WDT will/VB cost/NN around/IN $/$ 16/CD ./. They/PRP are/VBP currently/RB selling/VBG for/IN $/$ 8\/kg/CD at/IN Ah/NN Seng/NNP ./.
